messages.title: University Debt
messages.content: THE LIB DEMS BROKE THEIR PROMISES AND TREBLED TUITION FEES TO £9,000 A YEAR.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Reduce tuition fees to £6,000, Guarantee an apprenticeship for every school leaver who gets the basic grades
Cap annual rent rises and get 200,000 new homes built a year by 2020

issues.education: THE LIB DEMS BROKE THEIR PROMISES AND TREBLED TUITION FEES TO £9,000 A YEAR. Labour plans to reduce tuition fees to £6,000 and guarantee an apprenticeship for every school leaver who gets the basic grades.

housing.content: Cap annual rent rises and get 200,000 new homes built a year by 2020

images.caption: Leaflet showing Labour Party's criticism of Lib Dems on student tuition fee policy and Labour's own proposals on education and housing.
